content: this pattern can be found at *vogue knitting s* website under free patterns photo may be seen on page 59 of the *knit 1* winter 2007/2008 issue **pattern description from *knit 1* winter 2007/2008 ** kelly wilson crocheted bright stripes of vinyl fine jelly yarn by jelly yarns around plastic rings and attached the baubles to store-bought key-chain hardware **stuff ** * 1 ball each of 3 colors see below of fine jelly yarn by jelly yarns 7oz/200g balls each approx 85yds/75m vinyl * one size h/8 5mm crochet hook * 1 /2 5cm translucent plastic ring * 11⁄4 /32mm gold split ring **note from *knit 1 winter 2007/2008* ** approx 2 5yds / 2 5m of a 3yds / 2 5m of b and 3 5 yds / 3 5m of c are used for one keychain
